title: Incognito (1997) Jason Patric, dir. John Badham (DVDrip+opt.subs
description:
Optional ubtitles in separate idx/sub files: English, French and Spanish. <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0119365/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0119365/</a>

Famous director John Badham's tale of an artist who demonstrates how to make a perfect, fake Rembrandt painting -- against an exciting setting of international art conspiracy.

This is not my rip, I found it on the net using PirateBay's tracker, so I thought it should be represented here.
Widescreen, good stereo, 672x304, AC3.
Burn tested, runs well in my standalone DivX player.

P.S.: Sympathetic actor Jason Patric's career took a serios blow when 'Speed 2: Cruise Control' (1997) became a flop. Perhaps he, too, should have understood that it was hopeless to make a follow-up without Keanu Reeves,
